description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION, ERECTION OF A REAR FACING DORMER WINDOW WITH THREE ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ROOFSLOPE, TO FACILITATE A LOFT CONVERSION, ENCLOSING OF EXISTING CANOPY TO FORM A PORCH TO FRONT ELEVATION ALONG WITH THE ERECTION OF AN OUTBUILDING IN THE REAR GARDEN.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a single storey extension and the enlargement of windows to the front porch would consist of the enlargement or other alteration of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the erection of a rear dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the installation of two rooflights to the front rooflsope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The operations comprising the erection of an outbuilding would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 5 - The development comprising the outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 5 Arthur Road.
